infractions.Violation Summary: There were no new violations observed at the time of this inspection/visit
Appropriate child activity not provided by child care service unacceptable forms of discipline utilized by staff of child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service fails to conduct and document daily health assessment of incoming children

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service staff identified/acting as group teachers do not meet the required qualifications of the position
Child care service teaching staff acting as assistant teachers do not meet age and educational requirements
Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
